name: Clock&Core
description:
important note: don't use any of the power-ups/buttons basically don't press space, shift, or H.

Controls: (up-arrow = jump)  (down-arrow = duck) (left-arrow = move left) (right-arrow = move right)

the game's story: a man gets cursed into a clock thing by a witch and has to fight a clock monster in a clock factory to return to a man, along the way he falls into a 4-bit dimension.
